### üîë Autentica√ß√£o (A partir da v0.2.4)

A autentica√ß√£o agora utiliza **JSON Web Tokens (JWT)**. Para acessar os endpoints protegidos, siga os passos abaixo:

1.  **Obter o Token:**
    * Execute o endpoint de login: **`POST /api/auth/login`**.
    * Use suas credenciais de usu√°rio e senha no corpo da requisi√ß√£o (Request Body).

2.  **Autorizar o Swagger (OpenAPI):**
    * Copie o **token JWT** retornado no campo `access_token`.
    * Clique no bot√£o **"Authorize"** (Autorizar) no topo da p√°gina.
    * Cole o token no campo de autentica√ß√£o (Geralmente no formato **`Bearer SeuTokenAqui`**).

3.  **Executar M√©todos:**
    * Com o token configurado no Swagger, voc√™ pode executar todos os m√©todos protegidos.

---

**Credenciais de Teste:**

get.description: Retrieves a Wallet by their ID.

put.description: Updates a Wallet by their ID.

get.description: Retrieves customer data by ID. Admin-only operation.

put.description: Updates an existing customer by ID. Admin-only operation.

post.description: Creates a new Wallet with the data provided in the request body.

post.summary: Create a new transaction of type DEPOSIT
post.description: Creates a new transaction with the data provided in the request body.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of customers. Admin-only operation.

post.description: Creates a new customer. Admin-only operation.

get.summary: Get transactions by Wallet ID and Status
get.description: Retrieves a list transaction by Wallet ID provided in the request body.
Returns customer data associated with the authenticated user (JWT context).
